# Dance India Dance: Battle of the Champions

}}

DID: Battle Of The Champions or Dance India Dance Season 7 is the seventh season of Dance India Dance that premiered on 22 June 2019 with a unique concept.
Judges
*Kareena Kapoor Khan
*Bosco Martis
*Raftaar
